BugInstance.message: net.sf.maventaglib.Taglib.getFunctionClasses() may expose internal representation by returning Taglib.functionClasses
net.sf.maventaglib.Taglib.setFunctionClasses(String[]) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into Taglib.functionClasses
new net.sf.maventaglib.TagreferenceRenderer(Sink, Locale, Tld[], boolean, Log) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into TagreferenceRenderer.tlds
new net.sf.maventaglib.ValidateRenderer(Sink, Locale, Tld[], Log, ClassLoader) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into ValidateRenderer.projectClassLoader
new net.sf.maventaglib.ValidateRenderer(Sink, Locale, Tld[], Log, ClassLoader) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into ValidateRenderer.tlds
net.sf.maventaglib.checker.Tag.getAttributes() may expose internal representation by returning Tag.attributes
net.sf.maventaglib.checker.Tag.getVariables() may expose internal representation by returning Tag.variables
net.sf.maventaglib.checker.Tag.setAttributes(TagAttribute[]) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into Tag.attributes
net.sf.maventaglib.checker.Tag.setVariables(TagVariable[]) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into Tag.variables
net.sf.maventaglib.checker.Tld.getFunctions() may expose internal representation by returning Tld.functions
net.sf.maventaglib.checker.Tld.getTagfiles() may expose internal representation by returning Tld.tagfiles
net.sf.maventaglib.checker.Tld.getTags() may expose internal representation by returning Tld.tags
net.sf.maventaglib.checker.Tld.setFunctions(ELFunction[]) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into Tld.functions
net.sf.maventaglib.checker.Tld.setTagfiles(TagFile[]) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into Tld.tagfiles
net.sf.maventaglib.checker.Tld.setTags(Tag[]) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into Tld.tags
